column1: Little Goat Diner////I ordered the Pork Belly Home fries and the The Little Piggy Goes to China (I'm totally making these names up from memory
column2: so don't quote me on these dish names) and I was highly impressed. I'm always weary of Asian fusion places
column3: but the cooks execute the mixture of flavors PERFECTY. To simply describe it
column4: I was essentially having Asian comfort food.
